document_data.name: Enge
document_data.mainbody:
'''Enge''' was a fruit merchant from the City of Coin, [[Athkatla]], in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Ah, gut! Ve be havingk much fruit, yes? But you no be wantingk fruit, I be sure! I show you vat else I be havingk! Come! I show!''|Enge}}
document_data.Description: Galoomp was a portly man who spoke with a heavy and hard accent.
document_data.History: [[Enge's Shop]] could be found in the grand market in Athkatla's [[Athkatla/Center District|Center District]] â€“ [[Waukeen's Promenade]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}. The entirety of Enge's little shop was covered in displays and baskets of fruits of all varieties. Despite his busy green-grocer business, Enge also sold a humble selection of arms, armor, and simple ''[[healing potion]]s'.
